replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus! I hope you enjoy your time on the Server! It has changed a lot in one year :)
When you log on, be sure to read the book in your inventory; its very helpful and is there for a reason!

Have fun, don't hack, be nice and stay awesome!

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! As long as you ignore the annoying people you'll love the really cool people you find xD. I think you got more comments on your intro thread than i did ;-;. jk, it doesn't matter. You can look for me if you ever need PvP or rushing tips.
